data.title: List of Battles, 13th Minnesota Volunteer Infantry, 1898
data.meta_description: List of Battles Fought by the Thirteenth Minnesota Volunteer Infantry, 1898, Philippines
data.text:
The 13th Minnesota Volunteer Infantry

Contributed by Tim Richardson

Please Visit our Home Page to learn more about the Spanish American War Click here for the history and roster of the 13th Minnesota

General:

The following is an official list of the engagements participated in by the Thirteenth Minnesota Volunteer Infantry. This information was extracted from the program and regimental roster for the 51st Anniversary reunion of the 13th Minnesota Regimental Association. The reunion was held on August 13, 1949 in the Automobile Country Club House at Bloomington-on-the-Minnesota.

The Battle List:

Battle of Manila Regiment Aug. 13, 1898

Uprising of Insurgents Regiment Feb. 4, 1899

Riot in Tondo District Company C Feb. 5, 1899

Tondo District Uprising Co.Â’s C, D, L, M Feb. 22, 1899

Tondo District Uprising Co. C, G, M Feb. 23, 1899

Battle of Mariquina Road Regiment Mar. 25, 1899

Skirmish, Mariquina. Road Regiment Mar. 26, 1899

Skirmish near Bocaue Co. D Apr. 9, 1899

Skirmish near Santa Maria Co. C Apr. 9, 1899

Attack on Railroad Track Regiment Apr. 10-11, 1999

Battle of Santa Maria Regiment Apr. 12, 1899

Skirmish near Quingua Co. I Apr. 14, 1999

Skirmish near Guiguinto Co.'s A, B, F, L, M Apr. 14, 1899

Skirmish near Quingua Co. I Apr. 16, 1899

Battle of Guiguinto Co.'s A, B, F Apr. 20, 1899

Battle of Quingua Co.'s A, B, F, H Apr. 21, 1899

Skirmish near Quingua Co. I Apr. 25, 1899

With General Lawton's Expedition--Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M

Battle of Nonagaray Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M Apr. 23-24,1899

Skirmish near Angat Co.'s C, D, E, H Apr. 24, 1899

Attack on Norzagaray Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M Apr. 25, 1899

Battle of Angat- Co.'s C, D, E, H Apr. 25, 1899

Battle of Marunco Co.'3 C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M Apr. 27, 1899

Capture of Polo and San Rafael Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M Apr. 29, 1899

Battle Of San Rafael Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 1, 1899

Battle of Baliuag Co.'s C, D, E, G. H, K, L, M May 2, 1899

Battle of Maasin Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M . May 4, 1899

Skirmish near San Ildefonso Co. K May 8, 1899

Capture of San Ildefonso Co.'s C, D, H, G, H, K, L, M May 12, 1899

Capture of San Miguel Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 13, 1899

Battle of Salicot Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 15, 1899

Capture of Baluarre Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 16, 1899

Capture of San Roque Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 16, 1899

Battle of San Isidro Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 17, 1899

Capture of Gaparv Co.'s C, D, B, H May 17, 1899

Skirmish at San Antonio- Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 20, 1899

Skirmish near Arayat- Co.'s C, D, E, G, H, K, L, M May 21, 1899

Railroad Guard June to Aug. 1, 1899
